content: Google's Nano Banana Pro image model represents a significant advancement in AI image generation, offering capabilities that were previously unavailable.

The Nano Banana Pro image model enables 25 new capabilities in AI image generation, including real text rendering, accurate charts, whiteboard-style compression of dense documents, educational visuals, flowcharts, technical drawings, virtual staging, precise spot-editing, and media-to-media transformations.
The Nano Banana Pro image model introduces a 'reasoning-on-images' paradigm, which is considered a major practical advancement in AI.
